INSERT INTO sys_insect_rec_statis ( device_id, insect_id, `date`, `hour`, num ) VALUES
( #{item.deviceId}, #{item.insectId}, #{item.date}, #{item.hour}, #{item.num} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE num = VALUES( num )
mapper.select: SELECT sid.site_id AS siteId, ss.`name` AS siteName, SUM( a.num ) AS `number` FROM ( SELECT device_id, insect_id, `date`, num FROM sys_insect_rec_statis WHERE `date` BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ) AS a LEFT JOIN sys_insect_device AS sid ON sid.id = a.device_id LEFT JOIN sys_site AS ss ON ss.id = sid.site_id WHERE sid.site_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY sid.site_id

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT c.insect_id AS insectId, c.insect_name AS insectName FROM ( SELECT b.insect_id, b.insect_num, sii.`name` AS insect_name, spm.id AS m_id, spm.`name` AS crop_name, spm.measures_info FROM ( SELECT a.insect_id, SUM( a.num ) AS insect_num FROM ( SELECT device_id, insect_id, `date`, num FROM sys_insect_rec_statis WHERE `date` BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ) AS a LEFT JOIN sys_insect_device AS sid ON sid.id = a.device_id WHERE sid.site_id = #{siteId} GROUP BY a.insect_id ) AS b LEFT JOIN sys_insect_info AS sii ON sii.id = b.insect_id LEFT JOIN sys_preventive_measures AS spm ON spm.insect_info_id = b.insect_id ) AS c GROUP BY c.insect_id ) AS d

SELECT c.insect_id AS insectId, c.insect_name AS insectName, SUM( c.insect_num ) AS insectNumber, GROUP_CONCAT( c.crop_name SEPARATOR ',' ) AS cropName, GROUP_CONCAT( c.measures_info SEPARATOR '***' ) AS measures FROM ( SELECT b.insect_id, b.insect_num, sii.`name` AS insect_name, spm.id AS m_id, spm.`name` AS crop_name, spm.measures_info FROM ( SELECT a.insect_id, SUM( a.num ) AS insect_num FROM ( SELECT device_id, insect_id, `date`, num FROM sys_insect_rec_statis WHERE `date` BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ) AS a LEFT JOIN sys_insect_device AS sid ON sid.id = a.device_id WHERE sid.site_id = #{siteId} GROUP BY a.insect_id ) AS b LEFT JOIN sys_insect_info AS sii ON sii.id = b.insect_id LEFT JOIN sys_preventive_measures AS spm ON spm.insect_info_id = b.insect_id ) AS c GROUP BY c.insect_id
LIMIT ${pageSize * (pageIndex - 1)}, #{pageSize}

SELECT a.date, SUM( a.num ) AS insect_num FROM ( SELECT device_id, insect_id, `date`, num FROM sys_insect_rec_statis WHERE `date` BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ) AS a LEFT JOIN sys_insect_device AS sid ON sid.id = a.device_id WHERE sid.site_id = #{siteId} GROUP BY a.date
ORDER BY insect_num ASC LIMIT 1
ORDER BY insect_num DESC LIMIT 1
